channel.title: Sig Request ~ Vicscape ~
channel.description:
[b]REQUESTING SIG[/b]
I need a sig made with the title " Vicscape " in it along with pretty small words named " owned by vic 08 " or something, be creative.
If you could, i'd like it to be pretty creative, along with something that catches your eye. No girly stuff and some other dum things. I am not really sure on what it should be i just want something that is pretty unique. HAving like a black background or something and dripping metal that spells out vicscape im not entirely sure on what it would look like, also maybe add some monsters?
I just want a sig that is pretty creative that i could advertise around.
